content.description: A bit of a different style than most Carver problems. Technical crux is probably getting on the thing. Mental crux is committing to the friction slab moves at the dirty pine needle covered top. Bringing a brush recommended. Stay right for the V0, follow the crack left for the V4 traverse problem
content.protection: Maybe 2 or 3 pads if you're by yourself.
content.location: Obvious funnel slab on the North face of Water Tower Boulder.

content.description: Same start as Albatross.  Move left around the corner and follow the edges before moving straight up and topping out.
content.location: South face of the Titelist boulder.

content.description: Standing start with hands on yellow ovals. Â Right foot starts on large chip (lower red arrow). Move right hand to side pull (lower yellow arrow) then reach up with right again to jug between mantle arrows. Step up onto starting hand holds and top out using the "mantle" holds.
content.location: Problem to the right of Albatross on the side of the boulder facing out towards the field below trail.

content.description: Climb the right face of Quota boulder using right arete. .
content.location: Quota boulder is small, slim boulder immediately N of water tower boulder, most easily approached from Pioneer church. Use trail that starts on a low bridge just beyond property gate on Stone Cliff rd.

content.description: SDS then climb straight up to the left side of the face.
content.location: Water Tower boulder, W face. Obvious SDS at end of left side of face. Ground sloped beneath start-pad will slide.

content.description: Warmup with obvious handholds and multiple feet options.
content.location: Water tower boulder, west face, far right of Dried Up, by the walk off from other climbs on this boulder. Approach is easiest from Pioneer Church.

content.description: A nice line on the Titelist boulder.  This problem is on the side that faces the trail.
content.location: South face of the Titelist boulder.

content.description: These 3 boulders are on the main trail that leads from the gate to the main cliff.  There are around twenty problems on them that range from V2 to V6.
